data.name: Border Conqueror
data.detailed_description:
ğŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ğŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925010/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925000/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1844230/


About the Game

Border Conqueror is a visual novel of territorial suppression in which you are the commander, Captain Fetorem, of the Second Legion "winner" Fetorem of the Norman Empire, the most powerful fighting legion in the Empire. You will defend this most dangerous frontier, suppress the rebels, manage the territories or bully newly conquered territories and women, and fight against the enemy.

â—†Featured Systems

â—‡Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.

â—‡Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

â—†Story

The story takes place in the Norman Empire in the province of Thuriaud. After the Norman Empire conquered Keter, the western side of the continent was split in two, i.e., the Duchy of Sarich and of Krosa. After seven years of fighting for the throne, Sulipanaxa defeated all his rivals in Sarich. Having been ruled for seventy years, the Cestenersâ€™ discontent with the Normans grew. The Keter exiles, who had lost their country, also came to the region. It was then that the 13th Legion, â€œGryphonâ€ of the Norman Empire suddenly rebelled, blowing the trumpet of unrest.

The Norman Empire was at this time ruled by empress Catherine Norman. On the advice of her brother, Prince Nicholas Norman, she sent her best legion, the Second Legion of â€œFetoremâ€, from the North to the West to quell the unrest.

On one of the rainy summer days in the south of Norman, the rebels who were attacking the city were beaten by the sudden appearance of fresh troops.

â€œIn the name of the great Catherine, Empress of the Normans, of the Faon Union and of the Cesteners, the conqueror of Keter,â€
"I, Cypherus Alexandro Flavius Bellius Fetorem, Commander of the Second Legion of the Norman Empire, order the rebels to surrender immediately!â€
"The purpose of this battle is to retake the Imperial fortress of Cerrado! Surrender or die!â€

"How could â€˜Fetoremâ€™ be here?! Hurry! Retreat! Save your strength!!! Retreat!!!!"

"The Northern frontier is 450 miles from Thuriaud, and it only took him 9 days to get there, in the middle of an incessant storm! How rapid...â€

All Norman Empire's forces were brought to bear on the battle of Sarich, even though it would shake the country to its core. The story of the Second Battle of Thuriaud began...

â—†Gameplay

The game is a visual novel on territorial suppression. The player will lead Norman's strongest legion as they marched to crush the rebels, the Cesteners and the Keterians, and fought the enemy forces north of the Sarich.

Based on the information on the strategy map, the player needs to use their judgement in the strategy phase to carry out commands such as ã€marchã€‘, ã€securityã€‘, ã€reclamationã€‘, ã€trainingã€‘, ã€fortificationã€‘, ã€conscriptionã€‘ and ã€transportationã€‘.

During the war phase, the player can use the ã€Attackã€‘, ã€Defendã€‘, ã€Chargeã€‘ and ã€Throw Stoneã€‘ commands to destroy the enemy. After a victory, the player can use commands such as ã€Plunderã€‘ and ã€Reviveã€‘ to satisfy the needs of the army or contribute to the people, depending on their preferences.

â—† Game Features

â—‡ 33 basic CGs, including more than 500 differentials

â—‡ Game endings: 2 types (Excluding normal bad endings)
â—‡ Game text: 100,000
â—‡ A geographical suppression visual novel, medieval style game.

data.short_description: Border Conqueror is a visual novel of territorial suppression in which you are the commander, Captain "Fetorem", of the Second "winner" Legion of the Norman Empire, the most powerful fighting legion in the Empire.
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Thai, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, incest , drug abuse, self-harm, suicide, , General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
